com.amplifyframework.api.aws.utils

Class RestRequestFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.api.aws.utils.RestRequestFactory

  • public final class RestRequestFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory to create URLs and OkHttp Requests for REST-ful behaviors.

      • createURL

        public static java.net.URL createURL(java.lang.String endpoint,
                                     java.lang.String path,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryParameters)
                              throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Create an URL by appending the path and queries. Throws exception if the url is malformed.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - A valid endpoint
        path - path to be appended.
        queryParameters - query parameters
        Returns:
        Valid URL
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - Throw when the exception is not valid
